discussion.content: The question might has some wrong.Block known dangerous services is permissive, and accountable for everyone is prudent.

questions.question_text: Which command list all ports available on a server?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer should be Restoration, According to the CND book, Restoration is based on the assumption that the migration of the most critical business processes from a remote location precedes the migration of the less critical functions.

Selected Answer: B
Answer is B, CND Book P.2187

questions.question_text: Which BC/DR activity works on the assumption that the most critical processes are brought back from a remote location first, followed by the less critical functions?

Emmanuel works as a Windows system administrator at an MNC. He uses PowerShell to enforce the script execution policy. He wants to allow the execution of the scripts that are signed by a trusted publisher. Which of the following script execution policy setting this?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I bet for A, as CND Book P.666 says that: AllSigned only allows execution of scripts signed by a trusted publisher.

questions.question_text: Which of the following refers to the data that is stored or processed by RAM, CPUs, or databases?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Data IN use: data that is stored or processed by RAM, CPUs or databases. CND book page 1126

Selected Answer: D
correct answer is D as per CND

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D, CND Book P.1126, as Cyber_bunny says

questions.question_text: Elden is working as a network administrator at an IT company. His organization opted for a virtualization technique in which the guest OS is aware of the virtual environment in which it is running and communicates with the host machines for requesting resources. Identify the virtualization technique implemented by Eldenâ€™s organization.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
OS assisted or Para Virtualization: the guest OS is aware of the virtual environment. Page 1393 CND Book

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D, CND Book P.1393

Selected Answer: D
Para virtualization is a virtualization technique in which the guest operating system is modified to be aware of the virtual environment in which it is running. This allows the guest OS to communicate directly with the hypervisor or host operating system for resource allocation and management, resulting in better performance and efficiency compared to full virtualization.
